content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"AEM Sites is the content management system within Adobe Experience Manager that gives you one place to create, manage and deliver remarkable digital experiences across websites, mobile sites and on-site screens. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"AEM Sites uses marketing-friendly templates, developer-facing tools, and success-driven best practices and tools to publish experiences to webpages and modern apps in record time. With AEM Sites you may reuse and quickly adapt content to your customers’ preferences so you can connect with them faster across every channel. Create a unified customer profile spanning the breadth and depth of your data, and then use it to deliver the most relevant experience for each customer in meaningful, memorable ways. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Documentation:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://experienceleague.adobe.com/docs/experience-manager-65/authoring/home.html?lang=en&topic=/experience-manager/6-5/sites/authoring/morehelp/page-authoring.ug.js#key-aem-articles\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"
